posts.post_content: 2-2.5 out of 5. You have to assess this kind of card in the environment it's intended for - limited. In limited, it's a 3/2 for 3 - that's fine. Its power is on curve, which is the main thing. If the game stalls, the regeneration can even become relevant. It's no bomb by any means, but you wouldn't be too unhappy to run it in your limited deck.
